name: AIOMetadata
description: Ultimate Stremio metadata addon aggregating movies, series, and anime metadata from multiple sources (TMDB, TVDB, MAL, AniList, IMDb, TVmaze, Fanart.tv, MDBList).
author: cedya77

form_fields.label: TMDB API Key
form_fields.hint: Required: Your TMDB API key (get it from https://www.themoviedb.org/settings/api)

form_fields.label: TVDB API Key
form_fields.hint: Optional: Your TVDB API key for additional metadata (fallback to other sources if not set)

form_fields.label: Fanart.tv API Key
form_fields.hint: Optional: Your Fanart.tv API key for enhanced artwork (fallback to TMDB/TVDB artwork)

form_fields.label: MDBList API Key
form_fields.hint: Optional: Your MDBList API key for personal lists and catalogs

form_fields.label: RPDB API Key
form_fields.hint: Optional: Your RPDB API key for rating posters (fallback to standard posters)

form_fields.label: Admin Key
form_fields.hint: Secure admin key for configuration and cache management

form_fields.label: Hostname
form_fields.hint: Your hostname URL (auto-detected if empty, e.g., https://aiometadata.yourdomain.com)

form_fields.label: TMDB SOCKS Proxy URL
form_fields.hint: Optional: SOCKS proxy URL for TMDB requests

form_fields.label: Built-in TMDB API Key
form_fields.hint: Optional: Dedicated TMDB API key for cache warming

form_fields.label: Built-in TVDB API Key
form_fields.hint: Optional: Dedicated TVDB API key for cache warming

form_fields.label: Cache Warm Interval (hours)
form_fields.hint: How often to refresh popular content cache (default: 24)

form_fields.label: Cache Warm Language
form_fields.hint: Language for cache warming (e.g., en-US, fr-FR, default: en-US)
